dcterms:creator: Pete Warden
dcterms:description: A large-scale collection of spoken command words, containing 105,829 utterances of 35 words from 2,618 speakers; all the utterances are recorded in a 16 kHz sampling-rate format.
dcterms:title: Google Speech Commands Dataset

dcterms:creator: Aliaksei Kolesau
Dmitrij Se≈°ok
dcterms:description: The content of the Lithuanian speech commands dataset is created by translating 20 keywords from Google Speech Commands into the Lithuanian language. The dataset consists of recordings from 28 speakers, with each speaker pronouncing 20 words on a mobile phone.
dcterms:title: Lithuanian Speech Commands Dataset

dcterms:creator: Yu-Yi Lin
Wei-Zhong Zheng
Wei Chung Chu
Ji-Yan Han
Ying-Hsiu Hung
Guan-Min Ho
Chia-Yuan Chang
Ying-Hui Lai
dcterms:description: The dataset contains 19 Mandarin commands, each uttered 10 times from 3 dysarthric patients, with a 16kHz sampling rate.
dcterms:title: Dysarthric Mandarin Speech Commands Dataset

dcterms:creator: Lina Benamer
Osama Alkishriwo
dcterms:description: The Arabic speech commands dataset consists of 16 commands, including 6 control words and 10 digits (0 through 9), with each command having 100 samples, amounting to 1600 utterances in total.
dcterms:title: Arabic Speech Commands Dataset
